common.slow-on-mobile: Please wait. This process may take a minute or more on some mobile devices and slow PCs.

errors.fetch-version: Unable to fetch latest release version from Github
errors.loading-error: Error trying to get the data. Please try again later.
errors.wasm-no-available: The web browser you are using is not compatible with this wallet (it is not fully compatible with WebAssembly). Please update your browser or try using a different one.
errors.wasm-not-downloaded: There was a problem when trying to download an important component. Please check your internet connection and try again.

header.synchronizing: The node is synchronizing. Data you see may not be updated.
header.pending-txs3: Data you see may not be updated.
header.connection-error-tooltip: There was an error while trying to refresh the balance

errors.no-connections: No connections active, web client is not connected to any other nodes!
errors.no-backend1: Cannot reach backend. Please refresh the page and/or seek help on our
errors.csrf: Security vulnerability: CSRF is not working, please exit immediately.

buy.deposit-address: Choose an address to generate a BTC deposit link for:
buy.deposit-location-desc: Choose a wallet where you'd like us to deposit your Laqpay after we receive your Bitcoin.
buy.wallets-desc: Each time a new wallet and address are selected, a new BTC address is generated. A single Laqpay address can have up to 5 BTC addresses assigned to it.
buy.send-desc: Send Bitcoin to the address below. Once received, we will deposit the Laqpay to a new address in the wallet selected above at the current rate of {{ rate }} LAQ/BTC.
buy.fraction-warning: Only send multiple of the LAQ/BTC rate! Laqpay is sent in whole number; fractional LAQ is not sent!
buy.receive-desc: After receiving your Bitcoin, we'll send you your Laqpay. It may take anywhere between 20 minutes and an hour to receive your LAQ.
buy.otc-disabled: Sorry, otc has currently been disabled!
buy.details: You can buy Laqpays directly from your wallet using our Laqpay Teller service. The current rate is 0.0002 BTC per LAQ. To buy LAQ, request a BTC deposit address. Once you have a BTC deposit address, any BTC deposits will   automatically be added to your selected address.

wizard.wallet-desc: If you don't have a wallet, use the generated seed to create a new one. If you already have a wallet, toggle over to "Load Wallet" and enter your seed.
wizard.encrypt-desc: Increase security of your wallet by encrypting it. By entering a password below, your wallet will be encrypted. Only those with the password will be able access the wallet and remove funds.

confirm.title: Safeguard your seed!
confirm.desc: We want to make sure that you wrote down your seed and stored it in a safe place. If you forget your seed, you WILL NOT be able to recover your wallet!

change-coin.with-wallet: Coins you have created wallets for:
change-coin.without-wallet: Coins you have not created wallets for:
change-coin.no-results: No coins match the search term
change-coin.injecting-tx: It is not possible to change the coin while a transaction is being sent.

wallet.locked-tooltip: The seed is necessary to send transactions
wallet.unlocked-tooltip: Wallet temporarily unlocked to send transactions
wallet.delete-confirmation2: will be deleted. If you forget your seed, you will not be able to recover this wallet! Do you want to continue?
wallet.delete-confirmation-check: Yeah, I want to delete the wallet.
wallet.add-confirmation: If you add more addresses, the process of unlocking the wallet to perform certain operations will take more time. Do you want to continue?
wallet.already-adding-address-error: An address is already being added. Please wait.

new.seed-warning: Remember this seed! Keep it in a safe place. If you forget your seed, you will not be able to recover your wallet!
new.encrypt-warning: We suggest that you encrypt each one of your wallets with a password. If you forget your password, you can reset it with your seed. Make sure you have your seed saved somewhere safe before encrypting your wallet.
new.unconventional-seed-text: You introduced an unconventional seed. If you did it for any special reason, you can continue (only recommended for advanced users). However, if your intention is to use a normal system seed, you must delete all the additional text and special characters.
new.wallet-created: The wallet has been added to the list.

scan.connection-error: It is not possible to connect to the server. Please try again later.
scan.unsynchronized-node-error: It is not possible to restore the addresses because the server is not synchronized. Please try again later.
scan.title: Restoring addresses

unlock.confirmation-warning-title: Important: without the seed you will lose access to your funds
unlock.confirmation-warning-text1: For security reasons, this wallet will not be saved and you will need the seed to access it again after closing/refreshing the current browser tab. If you did not safeguard it, you will lose access to the funds. To confirm that you have safeguarded the seed and to be able to see the addresses of this wallet, please re-enter the seed in the box below.
unlock.confirmation-warning-text2-1: If you do not have the seed, you can delete the wallet by clicking

qr.title: Address
qr.copied: The text has been copied to the clipboard.

send.synchronizing-warning: The node is still synchronizing the data, so the balance shown may be incorrect. Are you sure you want to continue?
send.addresses-help: Limit the addresses from where the coins and hours could be sent
send.all-addresses: All the addresses of the selected wallet
send.outputs-help: Limit the unspent outputs from where the coins and hours could be sent. Only the outputs from the selected addresses are shown
send.all-outputs: All the outputs of the selected addresses
send.available-msg-part1: With your current selection you can send up to
send.available-msg-part4: must be used for the transaction fee).
send.change-address-help: Address to receive change. If it's not provided, it will be chosen automatically. Click on the "Select" link to choose an address from one of your wallets
send.destinations-help2: Destination addresses, their coins and coin hours
send.value-help: The higher the value, the more coin hours will be sent to outputs

tx.none: There are still no transactions to show

backup.seed-warning: BACKUP YOUR SEED. ON PAPER. IN A SAFE PLACE. As long as you have your seed, you can recover your coins.
backup.desc:
Use the table below to get seeds from your encrypted wallets.
To get seeds from unencrypted wallets, open the folder above, open the .wlt files in a text editor and recover the seeds.

pending-txs.none: Currently there are no pending transactions

change.url-label: Node URL (leave empty to use the default URL)
change.url-error: The entered host is already in use for this or another coin.
change.connection-error: It was not possible to connect to the node. Please check the URL and your internet connection and try again.
change.csrf-error: It is not possible to connect to the specified node since it is configured to use CSRF tokens.
change.invalid-version-error: The specified node is not compatible with this wallet. The node must be updated to at least version 0.24.0.

confirmation.title: Security
confirmation.text: Do you really want to allow access to "{{ url }}"?

history.no-txs-filter: There are no transactions matching the current filter criteria
history.no-filter: No filter active (press to select wallets/addresses)

disclaimer.disclaimer-description: By continuing, you understand the risks related to the use of cryptographic tokens & blockchain-based software, the Laqpay wallets, and the Laqpay cryptocurrency. You understand that this product is provided as-is, and agree to the Terms and Conditions governing the usage of this product.

disclaimer.disclaimer-desc: IF YOU USE THIS WALLET YOU MAY LOSE COINS. TESTING PURPOSES ONLY.

wallet.address-without-seed: trying to generate address without seed!
wallet.unknown-address: trying to update the wallet with unknown address!
wallet.wallet-exists: A wallet already exists with this seed
